document.masterDocTitle: On the Aleochara subgenera Ceranota and Xenochara. IV. A revision of types, a new species, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: On the Aleochara subgenera Ceranota and Xenochara. IV. A revision of types, a new species, and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae)

C o m m e n t: According to SCHÜLKE & SMETANA (2015),
A. inconspicua
was previously unknown from Armenia , where it is one of the most common
Xenochara
species.
